text: The 14th Terengganu State election will be held on or before 23 August 2018. The previous state election was held on 5 May 2013. The state assemblymen is elected to 5 years term each. The Terengganu State Legislative Assembly would automatically dissolve on 17 June 2018, the fifth anniversary of the first sitting, and elections must be held within sixty days (two months) of the dissolution (on or before 17 August 2018, with the date to be decided by the Election Commission), unless dissolved prior to that date by the Head of State (Sultan of Terengganu) on the advice of the Head of Government (Menteri Besar of Terengganu). ==Contenders== Barisan Nasional (BN) is set to contest all 32 seats in Terengganu State Legislative Assembly. Barisan Nasional (BN) linchpin party United Malays National Organisation (UMNO) is to set to contest major share of Barisan Nasional (BN) seats. Pan-Malaysian Islamic Party (PAS) is set to contest all 32 seats in Terengganu.Pas Terengganu mahu tanding 32 kerusi DUN dan Parlimen pada PRU14 Pakatan Harapan has decided to contest all 32 seats in Terengganu. However, Pakatan Harapan has yet to finalize the seats.Pakatan Harapan Terengganu mulai kecamuk Pakatan Harapan will finalize the remaining the seats before 23 February 2018. Agihan kerusi perlu selesai Jumaat ini - Tun M === Political parties === {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" |Coalition |- !Incumbent ! colspan="2" |Opposition |- |Barisan Nasional (BN) |Gagasan Sejahtera (GS) |50x50px Pakatan Harapan (PH) |- | * 45x45px United Malays National Organisation (UMNO) * 45x45px Malaysian Chinese Association (MCA) | * 45x45px Malaysian Islamic Party (PAS) | * 50x50px National Trust Party (Amanah) * 50x50px People's Justice Party (PKR) * 50x50px Malaysian United Indigenous Party (Bersatu) |} ==The contested seats== {| class="wikitable" ! rowspan="3" |No. ! rowspan="3" |State constituency ! rowspan="3" |Incumbent State Assemblyman ! colspan="6" |Political parties |- !colspan="2" | Barisan Nasional !colspan="2" |40x40px Gagasan Sejahtera !colspan="2" |50x50px Pakatan Harapan(ANALISIS) Riak pergolakan Pakatan Harapan TerengganuPPBM Terengganu umum senarai calonPRU-14: PAN umumkan calonnya bagi Terengganu |- |Candidate Name |Party |Candidate Name |Party |Candidate Name |Party |- |N01 |Kuala Besut |Tengku Zaihan Che Ku Abd Rahman (BN) |Tengku Zaihan Che Ku Abd Rahman |rowspan="13" |UMNO |Azbi Salleh |rowspan="32" |PAS |Che Ku Hashim Che Ku Mat |Bersatu |- |N02 |Kota Putera |Mohd Mahdi Musa (BN) |Mohd Mahdi Musa |Mohd Nurkhuzaini Ab Rahman |Tengku Roslan Tengku Othman |PKR |- |N03 |Jertih |Muhammad Pehimi Yusof (BN) |Muhammad Pehimi Yusof |Wan Azhar Wan Ahmad |Kamarulzaman Wan Su |Amanah |- |N04 |Hulu Besut |Nawi Mohamad (BN) |Nawi Mohamad |Mat Daik Mohamad |Ismail Abdul Kadir |Bersatu |- |N05 |Jabi |Mohd Iskandar Jaafar (BN) |Mohd Iskandar Jaafar |Azman Ibrahim |Abd Aziz Abas |Amanah |- |N06 |Permaisuri |Mohd Jidin Shafee (BN) |Abd Halim Jusoh |Zul Bhari A. Razak Ibrahim |Mohd Zukri Aksah |} == Election pendulum == The 14th General Election witnessed 22 governmental seats and 10 non-governmental seats filled the Terengganu State Legislative Assembly.
